job_description: About the job We are a digital agency that serves startups to Fortune 500 companies. Known for not just delivery and exceptional service, we are focused on serving with honesty and integrity. Position Overview We are seeking a skilled Fullstack Engineer to join our dynamic team. This role is pivotal in developing, maintaining, and enhancing our web applications using both front-end and back-end technologies. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in modern development practices and a passion for building scalable and efficient software solutions. Key Responsibilities Design, develop, and maintain high-quality web applications using Node.js and React. Write clean, maintainable code and create efficient APIs to connect front-end and back-end systems. Implement responsive user interfaces with a focus on user experience and accessibility. Utilize AWS services for application deployment, management, and scaling. Use Terraform for infrastructure as code, ensuring repeatable and reliable deployments. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Troubleshoot, debug applications, and conduct peer code reviews to ensure high-quality output. Qualifications Proven experience as a Fullstack Engineer or similar role, with a strong portfolio of web applications. Proficiency in Node.js, REACT, TypeScript, and related technologies. Experience with cloud platforms, particularly AWS, and understanding of cloud architecture. Familiarity with infrastructure as code tools, especially Terraform. Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and web services. Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen attention to detail. Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
